Header: 64 Division Educates All Ranks on Disaster Management
Content: The final segment of the series of Disaster Management lectures, conducted for troops of the 64 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) took place at Muthiyankaddukulam Battalion Training School on Saturday (16). 35 Army personnel including one Officer of 1 Sri Lanka Light Infantry of 59 Division, 14 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment of 68 Division and 23 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment of 64 Division attended the series of educative lectures during May 21 - June 16, conducted by a combined team of the Mullaittivu-based Disaster Management Centre, Air Force Officers, Naval Officers, Special Forces Officers and a few others. Lecture sessions focused on emergency relief roles during land, air, water or any other man-made disasters and precautionary measures in times of emergencies while placing stress on competence and trust worthiness. The programme implemented on a notion suggested by Major General Dushyantha Rajaguru, Commander, Security Forces - Mullaittivu was closely supervised by Brigadier Jayanath Jayaweera, General Officer Commanding, 64 Division. Brigadier Kithsiri Liyanage, 642 Brigade Commander organized the event with the help of relative Divisions.
